quote: Man invented language to satisfy his deep need to complain. – Lily Tomlin
fact: A rainbow can be seen only in the morning or late afternoon. It can occur only when the sun is 40 degrees or less above the horizon.
joke: Where does Fonzie like to go for lunch? Chick-Fil-Eyyyyyyyy.
